name: My First Nightmare
description:
You wake up in the middle of the night to go to the toilet. You call for your mom but she doesn't answer. Now you need to be brave enough and go to the toilet on your own !

Experience your first nightmare again.

Link to game : https://www.yahaha.com/app/spaces/274889384169

Made for #YahahaGameJam

GameJam theme : First How does this game fit into it ? Everyone in has faced this moment in their childhood when you wake up in the middle of the night because it felt like you fell from the bed. And then you need to go to the toilet but you simply can't because you are frozen with fear. You are expecting monsters in the closet. Ghosts in the drawing room.  This game is the same. It recreates a few of those childhood fears in a very weird dream sequence.

Contact : ShambaC#3440
